mapper.select: select gi.gift_id,count(gi.gift_id) as gift_num from np_order_goods_info_gift gift,np_order ord ,np_order_goods goods,np_gift gi where gift.order_goods_id=goods.order_goods_id and ord.order_id=goods.order_id and gi.gift_id=gift.gift_id and ord.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY gi.gift_id

select gi.gift_id,gi.gift_name,count(gi.gift_id) as gift_num from np_order ord ,np_order_gift ogift,np_order_marketing omarket,np_gift gi where ogift.order_marketing_id = omarket.order_marketing_id and omarket.order_id=ord.order_id and gi.gift_id=ogift.gift_id and ord.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY gi.gift_id
